website_summaries.verdict: Short length of rope that's perfect for one-on-one play time with your dog.
pros: Inexpensive dog toy that works nicely for all sizes of animals
Length of rope is short enough that it's easy to throw for a game of fetch
With knots on each end of the rope, both you and the dog can gain a solid grip for a game of tug
cons: Heavy chewers will be able to tear the rope apart

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews. Something has to be either outstanding or horrible. Unfortunately this falls into the later. I ordered two in XL. The first one lasted a day and half with threads all over my house. I assumed it must have been a fluke as the first one I ordered in 2017 lasted 8 months. I gave my dog the second one and it didn't even make it thru one evening. My dog is still a large puppy and an avid chewer, but this is ridiculous! You can tell the quality has gone down from the previous version. These are very soft, whereas the first one was more rigid. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBaby

customer_reviews.title: but I like how sturdy it feels so far
customer_reviews.text: Our dog hasn't really gotten into this toy much yet, but I like how sturdy it feels so far. It seems like it will stand up to rough play and chewing for our medium lab mix. I liked that it was a surprise when it got here (since you can't choose a color), we received a pink/green/white one. I'll update this review as she starts playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Bek

customer_reviews.title: I do not like to leave a negative review
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to leave a negative review, but seriously do not waste your money on this product. I purchased another knot rope 2 years ago that we still use and that my German shepherd has not destroyed. It cost twice as much as this one and now I know why. This product lasted less than two weeks. I have threads from it all over my family room and it is already unknotted on one end. I wanted a second knot rope to keep indoors and clean. I didn't even get "what I paid for".
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: I've bought several of these for my German Shepherds. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these for my German Shepherds. He loves playing with the toy, and it's held up well. A quick pop in the washing machine when needed (no fabric softener), and it's clean and ready for play again.
customer_reviews.author: BrynleahTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good value & fun!
customer_reviews.text: It's like most other rope toys in this price range. My dog LOVES it. Fun to do as an add-on, even if he demolishes it in a day or 2, he has such fun & likes to gnaw on it. His teeth get nice & clean. If he plays tug-o-war & it starts to un-knot, we just tie new knots. I'll keep buying these every once in a while if only for the happy look on his face!
customer_reviews.author: VegHead

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive-chew-proof! BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: My "aggressive chewer" can nibble/chew/rip to shreds all sorts of toys aimed at being super durable. Himalayan cheese bone rated 9/10 for chewing? Gone in 3 hours. Tennis balls? 10 minute life span before all the "fur" is carefully peeled off. Another "durable" rope toy? Gnawed in half and peeled apart. My pooch chews fast and quietly. There is no hope. Till this rope. 8 weeks in and going strong!! I mean.. the rope looks like it's had a hard life.. and it's fuzzier by far than the neat, tight braids it started with. But hot dang. We play with it every day, and it's alive and well!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Puppylove...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this toy... She is a big fan of "tug o war" and this rope does the trick. Perfect length and very durable....though definitely not indestructible. I have purchased several of these and you can't beat them for the price. For us they last about 2 weeks. For an indestructible toy I like the Goughnuts stick....however not good for smaller dogs (under 20lbs) or tug o war. Love this product and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DC Man

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what it is about this rope toy ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this rope toy, but my dog loves it! She chews on it, sleeps with it, and plays fetch with it. It's durable and has held up to dirt, slobber, and being thrown around a lot. I was skeptical that it would provide any dental benefit, but I have seen her bite the strings and pull the other end, thereby creating a flossing effect. I have zero complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great for fetch with added feature that dog will often chew on it.  Makes miserable smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like to fetch this in addition to balls. With balls, the dogs my chew for a few seconds and then go on to something new. With this knotted rope, both dogs spend time chewing the rope. One will chew for thirty minutes - which I assume is good for his teeth. Eventually the knotted rope will wear through.
customer_reviews.author: I only review products I bought

customer_reviews.title: A lot stronger than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually quite surprised. I am glad that waited to write my review. When I first opened it up, I was disappointed because they were a lot smaller than I expected. I bought them for my Great Danes, who managed to tear up everything they get in the first day. It has been about 5 months and they are still in fairly decent shape. I oldest Dane uses it as her "wubby"! She keeps it with her all of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable but odd odor
customer_reviews.text: Had a peculiar chemical odor that didn't wash out but my lab played with it anyway. I did worry about that smell though maybe not being good for him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A toy she can not destroy
customer_reviews.text: We have a husky and she has destroyed all her toys in a matter of minutes. That is what huskies do. She can chew away on this. We love playing tug with it. She is a happy puppy
customer_reviews.author: S. Kilborn

customer_reviews.title: Great rope toy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of this rope toy. I received one that was a different color (not a problem), but I thought it was worth mentioning. Our puppy has enjoyed chewing it and it has held up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This is not extra Large!
customer_reviews.text: The description is completely inaccurate. Extra large is something for a great dane or st bernard. This toy is probably appropriate for a 30-40 lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: mjn

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so yes, she destroys it. But it takes her three times longer to destroy it that any other rope toy, and at just around $3, I can afford to buy her one every couple of months. So 5 stars. (For reference, 'she' is a 45ish lb, 1 yr old Norwegian Elkhound/Mountain Curr.)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: My dogs absolutely LOVE these toys!
customer_reviews.text: Great chew and fetch/tug of war toys for aggressive chewers, puppies, and just plain big dogs who love to play. Durable, engaging to our pups, and priced right. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are crazy about this toy. They get in stalemate with the tug and I have to take it away or they will just stand there for 30 minutes waiting for one to let go. Great toy to add!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Super durable toy.
customer_reviews.text: Super strong & sturdy toy. I love playing tug of war with my dog & this is not the type of super cheap material that ya find at Walmart! If you're looking for a toy to play with your dog & you're considering this, I would SO go for it! $3 ain't gonna kill ya for such an awesome toy! Thank you. <3
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy rope for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy rope for the price! My dog is medium size dog at 44lbs. She has a lot of energy and tears apart her toys (especially rope toys) super fast but this particular rope is holding its own against my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My Staffy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Staffy loves chewing on ropes trying to destroy them and so far this one has held up just fine. We've had it for almost a month now and is still completely intact. I'll most likely be buying again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyM

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: My 40lb dog destroyed this pretty quickly but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: nisabisa

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the dog of a friend who was moving out of the US, and specifically purchased it for the stated "red, white, and blue" colors as a memory of home. However, the rope that arrived was purple, yellow, grey, and black. Very disappointed. If they are not going to send red, white, and blue colored chew toy, then they shouldn't state in the description that it is "red, white, and blue colors".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good toy for the money! I have three large dogs and they have loved playing tug-of-war with this rope toy. They are not too destructive with their toys, but they do tug and play hard with them. I like this so much I just bought another one since it's so popular with them - at the "add on" price it's hard not to!
customer_reviews.author: airborne82girly

customer_reviews.title: Bad for dogs that chew!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad for dogs!! My puppy was able to pull off and consume some of the materials used. She became lethargic and then threw up a LOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: very durable has lasted a couple of month's for my Lab Pit mix. I will buy again one of the better ropes I' purchased
customer_reviews.author: Trevor O' Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in and it was pinks/purples/white. Wasn't expecting those colors as the description says "reds, white, and blues." But I don't really care since my little man loves it. Seems pretty secure and tough, but I could see really aggressive chews being able to destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: JoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My big dogs love this one
customer_reviews.text: My big dogs love this one, even better than the bigger ropes I bought. It fits in their mouth but there really isn't enough for me to grab. But their happy so then I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not the color in the pic
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent rope toy and the price I paid was worth it I gave 4 stars because I didn't get the color in the picture what I got was a pink one with green and I didn't seem anything about colors vary
customer_reviews.author: Ariesaphcelie

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable. I've bought lots of rope toys for my 1.5 y/o GSD and they usually last weeks. This one lasted a couple days before he got it to unravel and then there were strings all over my house, not to mention that he started pooping out strings. Ick. It was also smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieT

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My Bull Puggle reduced that thing to a pile of string by the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It lasted a bit and was fun while it did
customer_reviews.text: I have a tough chewer. Within weeks, he was able to open the rope and fray it. It lasted a bit and was fun while it did. I'd recommend it for tough chewers but with a warning, don't leave this toy out for your dog. Let your dog use it only with your supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Franzheska Maysonet

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Great Value. I have a little giy that works on it daily. very little wear visible after over a month of daily use. Solid. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed in three days
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it so that's why it received 2 stars instead of 1. He's had it three days and has shredded it leaving threads all over the house. My dog is a medium sized dog and I ordered the xlg toy.
customer_reviews.author: D Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, except that this rope is more durable than most. My 100lb. dog generally shreds these and this one have lasted for several months now without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: SarahV

customer_reviews.title: Could be health hazard.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs destroyed this in short order and ended up swallowing the strings and pooping them out.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great rope for destructive dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog chews up everything except Nylabones but he loves rope. I was tired of buying the ropes and they were destroyed in a few minutes. This rope has lasted for weeks and he loves it. So happy with this product and when the time comes I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Boy

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this. He likes it more than the last rope toy we had.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: It has been holding up well.
customer_reviews.text: It has been holding up well. My dog normally pulls these apart in about a week. BUT--- he plays with this one much less than normal-- No idea why, so minus 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DZ

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this rope!
customer_reviews.text: He was so happy when I gave this to him that he's hardly put it down since.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting an XL but this is more like medium sized
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting an XL but this is more like medium sized. Not even large. What's XL about it? The overall size? Nope. the knots? Nope. The girth of the rope? Nope. Medium at best.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Good Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how good of a rope this is for the price! Better than the ones in the pet store and only $4! You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Pit loved her hour of destruction!
customer_reviews.text: Was in pieces within an hour, but my Pit sure did love that hour. Less than $5? Totally would pay another $5 for one more toy/hour.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Xtra large
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but not Xtra large as advertised. It's the 99 cent rope toy at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Color not as described or pictured. I only bought it because it's supposed to be red, white & blue but this toy is not those colors. The one I received is pink and purple.
customer_reviews.author: ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what you'd expect. It's pretty durable, but I'm sure my puppy will chew through it in good time. For the price, it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: David Carper

customer_reviews.title: My puppy (who is small but is an aggressive chewer) ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy (who is small but is an aggressive chewer) goes through most toys in 1 day to 2 weeks, but this rope lasted nearly a month.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for playing with my Shih Tzu. He likes to play rough and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, lasts pretty long even for a tough tugger of a dog
customer_reviews.text: The last Booda TUGGER TOY lasted about 6 months until the threads unraveled. But it's not bad as tugger toys go.
customer_reviews.author: FarleyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Previous versions were great and are still untangled months later
customer_reviews.text: Previous versions were great and are still untangled months later. But we just bought three more of these and all three were destroyed easily within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Chowdahsoup

customer_reviews.title: Not for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our GSP and after only a few days it fell apart. I had to dig huge chunks of string out of her mouth before I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: vrrein

customer_reviews.title: My dog destroys everything but these lasted a little longer ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog destroys everything but these lasted a little longer than I expected. One whole day longer but it was cheap so what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Gripples

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Only lasted a few days.
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 month old lab had this in pieces in only a few days. Other rope toys have lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Daffodil

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy
customer_reviews.text: This time the rope was not twisted taunt enough and too much fringe as the knots needed to be tied closer to the end, This is the 2nd one I bought and the first was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggles

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected and a great price. My husky puppies love this toy. It's a good size and very sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bdaws

customer_reviews.title: Rottweiler loved this!
customer_reviews.text: Our Rottweiler loved this! He immediately took to chewing on it and playing tug of war with me. And he has cleaner teeth now too ;)
customer_reviews.author: Korey Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Not for an aggressive chewer.
customer_reviews.text: Husky pup destroyed it in a few days. Probably better for smaller, less hyper pup.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: good for heavy chewers, they will eventually destroy it, but it's thick.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it at first but the dog was able to unravel it fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Denney

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes and it's lasting
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very happy with it, and I'm very happy with it because it is lasting longer than I anticipated, in spite of some serious chewing.
customer_reviews.author: NYCity/Country

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! This is just a bunch of loose string tied at the knots! Our goldendoodle chewed it up in one hour! Strings everywhere! I had to take it away from him.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our new rescue dog loves this doggie toy. Lots of fun playing with her and the TopDawg.
customer_reviews.author: PRIME Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable! Got it for the dogs for Christmas and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: baela

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few days
customer_reviews.text: Dog chewed it up within a few days. Boxer/hound mix, medium breed
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Did not last very long at all. I have had others last much longer. Seemed to "unravel" once my girl got a small spot broken
customer_reviews.author: Snail

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy. It can handle a lot more chewing and tugging than anything else my Frenchie plays with.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Tough toy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It seems durable, my dog usually chews through most toys we give her, but this one is tough.
customer_reviews.author: AOK

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with the quality and price of this rope toy
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the quality and price of this rope toy. Purchased for our new puppy and works great for those sharp puppy teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Swyers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you have an 80-pound pitbull puppy that chews things up right away this will last about 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Stillings

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my large german shepherd
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my large german shepherd, she loves it and carries it everywhere with her, loves to play tug of war and fetch with it.
customer_reviews.author: mgrubbe85

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product stated it was an XL and it was small! Did not last more than an hour. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality toy for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this rope toy. It's sturdy and even smells good! It's great for him to play with and naw on. The price was great, too.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it or should I say my Golden loves it.
customer_reviews.author: B.Del

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My dog is a heavy chewer and he hasn't torn it apart yet and we have had it for about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: longer than it looks on pic! doggie loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good chew toy!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this rope toy! It has held up better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Same quality as the pet store but for way less.
customer_reviews.author: MoonBeam9

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, but quality looks to be top notch
customer_reviews.author: InfiniteReality

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Duped once again , not even close to the size on the picture
customer_reviews.author: sofizzle9976

customer_reviews.title: GOOD rope, well made!
customer_reviews.text: dog loves it, holds up much better than our first rope toy, definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great rope. My 8 month old yellow lab loves! He plays fetch and tug-a-war with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Cochran

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden has to have something in his mouth most of the time. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Children's Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hold up well to very aggressive chewing. Washable, great value.
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this toy keeps them busy for hours! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP216

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 80# lab/pit mix loves his rope toys and these ones actually last several months versus other brands.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Cow bone
customer_reviews.text: My two Pits destroyed it after 4 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Harbart

customer_reviews.title: Tug of war with puppy
customer_reviews.text: Wash it, or it will stink the house up, nice rope tie though
customer_reviews.author: ALLEGRA I.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality tug toy for a good price. Its nothing special but my dog enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog (miniature dachshund) loves it and hasn't torn it to pieces yet, bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: one happy gsd!!
customer_reviews.text: My GSD loves this toy. Not to sure how long it will last as he likes to pull on the threads but so far has been great
customer_reviews.author: Dana Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. 2 big labs tug all day. Shredded in about a month
customer_reviews.author: bookgirl_54

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old Golden Retriever demolished this toy in less than 15 minutes. I would not recommend this toy for an aggressive chewer. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: lasted only a few hours - my chocolate lab ate right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Basile

customer_reviews.title: Great rope toy for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It's held up really well and my small dog loves it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good for heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and long lasting with Dr. Destructo, my great dane. Way outlasts the Kong Tugga.
customer_reviews.author: coleridgedane

customer_reviews.title: Good chew toy
customer_reviews.text: Puppy liked this and it saved my hands from the puppy needle teeth.
customer_reviews.author: janis

customer_reviews.title: Supervise your pet!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this toy was well built. It was thick and a decent size for my mini schnauzer but after a few times of him playing with it, it begin to fray in the middle. He's never played with it more than 5 minutes at a time but while I was watching him chew at it last night, I noticed that he was licking his lips a lot... He managed to get some in his teeth and I found a chunk of it hanging from his doggy beard. I'm not sure if he's eaten any of it though. Definitely won't let him play with this unsupervised anymore. He loves it but it is dangerous for him :(
customer_reviews.author: RiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them, they have held up longer than done of the other toys.
customer_reviews.author: A. Starr

customer_reviews.title: My puppies where both happy!
customer_reviews.text: This item was fairly priced and durable. My puppies where both happy!
customer_reviews.author: Robin E.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not as tightly wrapped as some, my dog tears it apart in days.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Fongeallaz

customer_reviews.title: so pretty good testimonial
customer_reviews.text: Holding up to my German Shepherd, so pretty good testimonial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Aspen/Booda Corporation DBX50774 2-Knot Rope Bone Dog Toy, X-Large
product_meta.description: Size:Extra LargeBooda 2-knot rope bone dog toy can be used for interactive play or as solo dog chews. Rope bones are fun and easy way to floss dogs gums and help prevent dental disease in your canine companion. Rope bones have tightly twisted yarns that provide for long-lasting durability. Available in extra large size. Combination of red, white and blue colors.
feature_bullets: 2-Knot rope bone dog toy can be used for interactive play or as solo dog chews
Rope bones are fun and easy way to floss dogs gums and help prevent dental disease in your canine companion
Rope bones have tightly twisted yarns that provide for long-lasting durability
Combination of red, white and blue colors
